JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Offshore Welder Foreman for Gas Lift Project
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a skilled Welder Foreman to oversee our Gas Lift Project offshore, which is scheduled to begin in March 2025 and conclude in July 2025. This will be a project-based role with a 2:2 rotation schedule.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead and supervise a team of welders and fabrication professionals during the offshore Gas Lift Project.
  • Ensure all welding, fabrication, and installation tasks meet high industry standards, as well as safety and quality regulations.
  • Manage day-to-day operations, making sure the team works effectively to meet deadlines.
  • Monitor project progress and handle any challenges or issues that arise on-site.
  • Ensure that all activities comply with relevant offshore policies and safety protocols.
  • Provide leadership, training, and support to the team to ensure smooth execution of tasks.

Qualifications:

  • Extensive experience as a Welder Foreman in offshore oil and gas projects.
  • Proven leadership and supervisory skills with the ability to manage a diverse team.
  • Strong technical expertise in welding processes and fabrication techniques.
  • Excellent communication skills in English.
  • Able to work effectively under pressure and meet tight deadlines.

Welcome to Semco Maritime

This is an excellent opportunity to contribute to a high-profile offshore project. If you meet the qualifications and are ready to join a professional team, we encourage you to apply.

We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, you must submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page. 
If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Anna Dam at anna@semcomaritime.com
